item.title: Install testing kernels in Fedora
item.description: If you’re on the latest Fedora release, you’re already running lots of modern packages.

item.title: Keep old kernels with yum and dnf
item.description: When you upgrade packages on Red Hat, CentOS and Fedora systems, the newer package replaces the older package.

item.title: Automatic package updates with dnf
item.description: With Fedora 22’s release date quickly approaching, it’s time to familiarize yourself with dnf.
